name: Camacho - Brotherhood Series - Hard Charger Toro
additionalNotes: The Hard Charger is the third installment in Camacho’s Brotherhood Series, which pays homage to the military. According to Camacho, the Hard Charger name “refers to the aggressive spirit often demonstrated by military personnel.” Handmade in Honduras, the Hard Charger features a natural USA Connecticut Broadleaf that covers a binder and filler made of Honduran Corojo tobaccos.
